title: Drawing, "Designs for Tree D3 and D11", 2011
medium: Graphite on white paper mounted on white paper
signed: Signed in graphite, lower left: Andrea Branzi 2011
provenance: Andrea Branzi; Friedman Benda Gallery until February 2013
creditline: Gift of Marc Benda and Barry Friedman, courtesy of the artist
description: Four different designs depicted. Upper left: a rectangular structure containing three trees flanked by four ladders; left center: a structure containing four trees with disks growing from the sides of each tree, a large X crosses the entire frame, the number 6 encircled to the right and a human figure next to it; right center: nearly identical to the previous structure but without the X or the human figure, the number 7 encircled at left and an arrow points to the structure from above; lower right: a post and lintel structure with three posts or trees containing three large rectangular forms, an arrow points to the structure from above.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Designs for Tree D3 and D11", 2011. Graphite on white paper mounted on white paper. Gift of Marc Benda and Barry Friedman, courtesy of the artist. 2013-24-1.
